With the launch of Bitcoin in 2008, hundreds of similar projects based on blockchain technology have emerged. These crypto-based currencies (or coin) are extremely valuable and have potential to be used as currency in future.

In 6th December 2017, Bitcoin alone had a market capitalization above \$200 Billion.

How big is the Bitcoin Market compared to others?

Bitcoin has heavy competition with other competitors. Still, it's dominant in market capitalization.
